decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Plan entitled: Flat 47, Flanders Mansions, Flanders Road, Chiswick, London, W4 1NE, no date, no author, no reference, received 28 April 2014 and Plan entitled: Plan of 47 Flanders Mansions, no date no author, no reference, received 03 April 2014.) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those detailed within the application (White UPVC).
Condition : 4 - The shape, design, dimensions, colour and opening style of the windows shall match the existing windows of the building.
